uk.ac.ed.csbe.sbsivisual.sbsiDataFormat
Interface ISBSIHeader

public interface ISBSIHeader

Represents the contents of an SBSI data format header file. Implementations should not be linked to file-systems in order to maintain flexibility in how the objects are used. Equality should be based on object identity, based on the following reasoning:

  • Since the objects are mutable, equality can't be based on mutable value, since this could break behaviour in collections.
  • An primary identifier attribute could be introduced. This however would require validation of files at creation time to ensure an id attribute was present. Also, copying files would require management of IDs, and ensuring unique IDs between file-systems would be hard to guarantee. Neither of these solutions are acceptable, so equality is based on reference for now. For an ISBSIHeader created from parsing an SBSIHeader document, repeated calls to document.getHeader() will return the same instance of the ISBSIHeader.

    Author:
    Richard Adams / Neil Hanlon
